mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(class_id, user_id, course_id, date, notice_detail_id) VALUES(#{classId}, #{userId}, #{courseId}, #{date}, #{noticeDetailId})
mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_id, n.class_id, n.user_id, n.course_id, n.date, n.notice_detail_id, nd.notice_detail_id as "noticeDetail.noticeDetailId" ,nd.content as "noticeDetail.content", nd.title "noticeDetail.title" FROM notice n INNER JOIN notice_detail nd ON n.notice_detail_id = nd.notice_detail_id WHERE n.class_id = #{classId}
